short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adiuvo Assistant is designed to help gather analytics for Adiuvo Boards. If you do not own one, this will do nothing for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We are introducing the Adiuvo Assistant, a chrome extension designed to help gather analytics for the Interactive Digital Adiuvo Boards. By tracking the clicks on your board, the Adiuvo Assistant processes when the clicks happen, along with the pre-existing data of your board to provide analytics. This chrome extension is designed for the Adiuvo Boards, therefore if you do not own one the Adiuvo Assistant will not be applicable to you.
